academic-paper.page-body:
References

  • Blood, R. (December 2004) How blogging software reshapes the online community. Communications of the ACM – The Blogosphere. 47 (12) [Online].
    Available from: http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1035134.1035165 [Accessed 9th May 2011].
  • Carlson, N. (March 2010) At Last – The Full Story of How Facebook Was Founded. Business Insider. [Online].
    Available from: http://www.businessinsider.com/how-facebook-was-founded-2010-3 [Accessed 10th May 2011].
  • Cohen, P. (February 2008) At Harvard, a Proposal to Publish Free on Web.The New York Times. [Online].
    Available from: http://msl1.mit.edu/furdlog/docs/nytimes/2008-02-12_nytimes_open_access_harvard.pdf [Accessed 10th May 2011].
  • Dwyer, C., Hiltz, S. & Passerini, K. (2007) Trust and Privacy Concern within Social Networking Sites: A Comparison of Facebook and MySpace. AMCIS 2007 Proceedings. [Online].
    Available from: http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.148.9388&rep=rep1&type=pdf [Accessed 5th May 2011].
  • Java, A., Song, X., Finin, T. & Tseng, B. (2007) Why We Twitter: Understanding Micro blogging Usage and Communities. Proceedings of the 9th WebKDD and 1st SNA-KDD 2007 workshop on Web mining and social network analysis. [Online].
    Available from: http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1348556 [Accessed 5th May 2011].
  • Jungherr, A. (2009) The Digiactive Guide to Twittter for Activism. Digiactive.com, Creative Commons Licensed e-Book. [Online].
    Available from: http://www.tavaana.org/uploads/2071502000341267128282670/files/Guide to Twitter for Activism - PDF - English.pdf [Accessed 7th May 2011].
  • Lloyd, I. (2008) Build your own web site the right way using HTML & CSS. 2nd Edition. Collingwood, SitePoint Pty Ltd.
  • Oglens. (February 2011) What is the advantage of a blog over a traditional web site. [Online].
    Available from: http://oglens.com/what-is-the-advantage-of-a-blog-over-a-traditional-web-site [Accessed 11th May 2011].
  • Viswanath, B., Mislove, A. & Gummadi, K. (2009) On the evolution of user interaction in Facebook. WOSN ’09: Proceedings of the 2nd ACM workshop on online social networks. [Online].
    Available from: http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1592675 [Accessed 7th May 2011].
